options.autofish.title: Autofish Settings
options.autofish.enable.title: Enable Autofish
options.autofish.enable.tooltip: Toggles the entire mod on or off.
options.autofish.multirod.title: Enable MultiRod
options.autofish.multirod.tooltip_2: moving to the next as they break.
options.autofish.break_protection.title: Enable Break Protection
options.autofish.persistent.title: Enable Persistent Mode
options.autofish.persistent.tooltip_0: Enable this to always keep the fish hook
options.autofish.persistent.tooltip_1: cast whenever a rod is in hand.
options.autofish.persistent.tooltip_4: This is useful for lag issues or when
options.autofish.persistent.tooltip_5: fishing for long periods of time.
options.autofish.sound.title: Use Sound Detection
options.autofish.sound.tooltip_3: - You must be somewhat close to the
options.autofish.sound.tooltip_5: - If other players' hooks are near
options.autofish.sound.tooltip_6: yours, it can falsely trigger a catch!
options.autofish.multiplayer_compat.tool: This provides compatibility with third party mods.
options.autofish.recast_delay.title: Recast Delay (ms)
options.autofish.recast_delay.tooltip_1: a fish and recasting the rod.
options.autofish.clear_regex.title: ClearLag Chat Pattern
options.autofish.clear_regex.tooltip_1: this pattern is matched in chat.
options.autofish.basic.title: Basic Options
options.autofish.advanced.title: Advanced Options
